description:
Momoyo continues to search for Tachibana Takae while Yamato is severely injured in the hospital. The girls surround him and tell them their feelings for him. It`s a touching scene. But it isn`t too long before the girls realize they`re all rivals for Yamato`s affection...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Maji de Watashi ni Coming Out Shinasai!!
真剣で私にカミングアウトしなさい!!
